name: Please the Cat
description:
Quickly now! Our fickle Lord the Cat demands to be served his glowing num nums with haste!
Race to please or you will be cooked to perfection - a win win for our Lord.

How to play:

Controller or Keyboard (Designed with Controller in mind)

Movement: Left stick of WASD

Start Lamp: X button/ J (Keyboard)

Pickup: A button/ K (Keyboard)

Start the lamps and Grab the glowing orbs! Place the orb the cat wants at the door before they change their mind.

This is my first game and would really like to hear your thoughts and critiques.
